text: Yikhniy prorok skazav yim, znak yoho tsaryuvannya shcho Ark Domovlenosti bude restavruvatysya do vas, pryvedennya zatverdzhennya z vashoho Lorda, ta relics lyshav lyudʹmy Moses ta lyudʹmy Aaron. Tse bude nosytysya anhelamy. Tse povynno buty perekonlyvyy znak dlya vas, yakshcho vy diysno viruyuchi
